content:
1300 Euros per month.

I am open to negotiating with you.

Do you have any other requirements or expectations for the rental agreement?

Do you have any concerns or questions about my qualifications as a tenant?

content:
Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Nesibe. While 1300 Euros per month is certainly a reasonable rental price, I am still looking to maximize my gains. I would like to discuss the possibility of a longer lease term or additional amenities that could be included in the rental price.

As for my requirements or expectations for the rental agreement, I am looking for a responsible and reliable tenant who will pay rent on time and maintain the apartment in good condition. I would also like to see some references or previous rental agreements you have had to ensure that you are a good fit for my property.

In terms of the apartment itself, I would like to ensure that it is being used in a responsible and respectful manner, and that any damage caused by the tenant is promptly repaired.

Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Nesibe. I agree to the rental price of 1300 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
